type.name: org.gradle.platform.base.BinarySpec
type.description: Represents a binary that is the result of building a component.

method.name: getInputs
method.description:
Returns all inputs of the binary. This includes source sets owned by the binary, and other source sets created elsewhere (e.g. inherited from the binary's component).

returns:all inputs of the binary.

method.name: getSources
method.description:
The sources owned by this binary.

returns:the sources owned by the binary.

method.name: getTasks
method.description: The set of tasks associated with this binary.

method.name: isBuildable
method.description: Can this binary be built in the current environment?

property.name: buildable
property.description: Can this binary be built in the current environment?

property.name: inputs
property.description:
Returns all inputs of the binary. This includes source sets owned by the binary, and other source sets created elsewhere (e.g. inherited from the binary's component).

returns:all inputs of the binary.

property.name: sources
property.description:
The sources owned by this binary.

returns:the sources owned by the binary.

property.name: tasks
property.description: The set of tasks associated with this binary.
